text: Khanadelwal mera bhai..college ka sabse bada chaapu ğŸ˜, tumse bada inspiration sahayd he koi ho. text: Meri jaan, mere bhai kaam real brother, kya naseeb the ke hume same room mila 1st year me,1st year me bhai classes aur test exam se uppar aa gaye tha aur ab dekho ekdum maggu, Bhai ye class he nahi jaata tha ğŸ˜‚. Baap wing ke finalist se ya fest me backchodi karne ya raat raat tak baate karke pratyush ko pareshan karna you were there to make these moments amazing. I remember going out of campus to Z sqaure and bahi apna rave moti aur momos kitne tasty the voh. I will never forget you telling me ke mere friends kyu nahi baante and that actually changed me a lot. Tu me aur shashank ke bulla session were out of the world ğŸ˜‚.Aur tere aayashi yaar bhai ke humesha kisis bichari kanya pe dil aajata thağŸ˜‚, Its sad ke aab kisi problem se tere room nahi jaa paunga, I wish me wapas 1st year ke room me jun aur window me khade khokar apni psychology ke baat sunkar haasu ,Aur mind may forget but you will always have a brother here in my heartğŸ˜ future me nahi mila toh dukh hongağŸ˜­

text: Are aniket.... my friend... hum I think HAB me first time mile the ,2nd year me uske baad tu mai aur jindal ke kafi backchodi hoti rehti thi aur hum kitne maze karte the.... 2nd year me toh frequently milte the and those HAB work was itself some new fun tasks... uske baad 3rd year me me MESS secy aur tu Maintainance Secy bana fir toh bro apna aalag he bonding ho gai I remember aapan ek dusre ka kaam bhi kardete the and the Diwali was fked up bro but I tried my best to calm the situation.... bhai I always knew that uppar se tu jitna bhi sakth londa baane aandar se u had a great gold character and thats what amazed me... U were always there for friends and always had my back, Mere ko yaad hai tune ek baar mereko handel kiya that when I was drunk as a skunk and bro I remember our daily fights they were also awesome .... Tu toh milenga he mereko Blore me and I hope even uske baad bhi till then Take care brother aur ha bc Hall 2 ka tempo High Hai ğŸ˜â¤ğŸ§¡ğŸ’›ğŸ’š.

text: Poonia BHAi!!.... aapan D top ke top stairs pe mile the first time aur tab mereko pata chala nature kitna amazing hai ğŸ˜‚, apni endless parties from hall2 to hall 9 was superbğŸ˜. Hall 2 me balti aur bottle se kafi saving karlet the. Sale tu peekar bolta bohot hai boss ke sath mat peenağŸ˜‚. text: Yo BRO! yo bhai... mr. cool buddy, Hall2 se Hall 9 tak apaan ne kafi maze kiye aur saath me kafi dark aur personal shit bhi share kari, Bc apni roz party hoti thi literallyğŸ‘€, Will never forget the Holi special edition jisme puri gang nature se connect hui thi ğŸ˜‚, yeh aisa dost hai jo if possible kabhi jhoot nahi bolenga aur help ke liye kabhi mana nahi karenga but sala dhoka se hurt bhi utna he jaldi hota hai , iske room nahi ek mandir the jisme roz naye bhaakt dikhte the ğŸ˜‚. Hall9 mess ke roof,hall 2 D top roof, tera Hall 2 room aur hall 9 room: I hope we can add to these memories whenever I see you in future, baki I know agar same city me honge toh city bohto kuch dekehngağŸ˜‚ğŸ˜Š

text: Deepak, Mere bhai mere roome mere dost kaam more like a real Brother, maine jab tumhe itne passion se game khelte dekhta tabhi soch liya ke apan he roommates banenge, tum humesha ek unsolved mystery rahe jisko solve karna bohot mushkil tha, kyuki tume kholna bohot muskil tha, maybe in the end I succeded ğŸ˜‚. Apan ne sath me CPI girayi aur uthai hai, alag alag reasons se. Sorry jab jab tu kuch sunata tha mai beech me tookta tha ğŸ˜‚ I enjoyed doing that. Maine kafi try kiya ke apne thode jhagde ho aur maza aaye but u were always the peacekeeper. Apan sab share karte the aur girls kpop toh alag he ğŸ˜‚. Kitne kathi me raid mare hai, aur jaise he kuch mast milte tha internet me share karte the.  I know you are not very social but stay in touch. You will always be my brother.
author: Aaiyush  Kapurwan

text: Dinesh, mera bhai mera dost mere wingi ğŸ˜œ,starting se end tak aapan kafi backchod dost rahe, fest ke masti ya pure wing ke GPL me apna participation humesh rehta thağŸ˜, Udghosh ke ShowM me kya bachkchodi kari thi aapan ne, seniors ke kitni maari thi ğŸ˜‚, inhone humesha party ke liye maana kara but humne koshish nahi chodi, maybe aage tumhe mana lenge. text: Mere bhai!... text: Aur roomie .... maine tere sath first time daaru pe thi aur shashank kaise pee raha tha ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚, yaar summer was amazing muzhe bada maza aata tha jab apne jaghde hote the, but bhai jaghde se hi dosti baad ti hai, humne satth me cooler liiya tha but kya kaata tha aapna, aagar koi bandi paad rahi hai toh pls Rishab ko approach karo he is a good guyğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚, First year me hagge ke udhar tu mera first dost tha and bhai fest ka dance ya raat raat tak bulla kaatna aur first year me courses saath me karna was amazing, soory me kafi chutiya tha us time but I will make up for everything if we meet again ,Party meri taraf se ğŸ˜€, Same city hai shayad I hope we meet again and catch up cause you will always be my roomie ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜.

text: Are kya bolu tere baare me ğŸ˜‚, thanks to branch change ke mereko shashank jaise dost mila, bro maine first time tere sath daaaru pee thi aur tu kaise pee raha tha ğŸ˜‚, we were friends just more than some events ,bc hum rozz bulla kaarte the and mereko yaad hai kaise tune baap wing me DOPA ke upadhi le thi sale ko 6 se jaada PS ke naam aate thağŸ˜‚, amitesh tu aur me kitne night out maar hai and bro you were always the best dressed in the room ğŸ˜, 2nd year se 4th year tak bhai ne kitna bachaya mereko ğŸ¤£, isko pata tha me assignemnt nahi karunga toh bhi humesha help karta tha, He is a tgem, tu nahi hota toh shayd college boring hota, but shashank ke asli hustle roop maine 4th year me dekhi,but jub bhai sutta ke name pe paatle hota tha tab mereko laga fk yeh toh kafi kuch new hai, Roz kitna enjoy kara aapan ne maybe different locations but sutta was there to unite us ğŸ˜‚, tere shayari aur logic pe the hum fida chalo kabhi daaru ke nashe me yaad karlenge voh din, milte rehna aur aise he faadu rehna. Love you susuğŸ˜.

text: Shubham (the Dabang).... sale daring karne me aapan ne kabhi nahi sharmaya , aur RIP to our endless entrapenure ideas bc tu sochta sahi tha but fir waapas lazy hota tha. Yaar acche dosto ka memoir likhna difficult hota hai....second year bc aapan HAB me the aur kitna kaam karte the ğŸ˜‚, tune HSS aur maine music ka kaam liya tha but those were some fking awsome days uske baad summer me VTOL ka kya chutiya kaaata tha ,sala sir tereko bolte the aayush kaam nahi kaarta aur tu bacha leta tha thanks bhai ğŸ˜ fir me suman aur tu nightout maar ke bihar bojhouri disco ke maze lete tha bc ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Fir 3 rd year me bhai na convenor aur maine mess secy ka role liya but bc responsibility ke naam pe aapne kafi arguments hote the..matlab humesha me he jeeta tha ğŸ˜‚, and that diwali was lit af, but bro tune paata nahi kitne endless time bachaya. 4th year me tum nahi aaye but I know tu woh banda hai jisko apna kuch karna hai and bc jab startup karenga mereko co-Founder bana lena aapan chaap denge ğŸ˜. Finally bro thanks for some amazing memories I hope next time the drinks will bring them back. Same city hai apni I hope we meet soon. Love you bitchğŸ˜.

text:
Tushar brother... 
Bhai tere kitne nakhre hote the I remember new shop C ke chaat me jaan tha tereko aur meri gand faat gai thi ke sala akela kyu jaa raha hai but that day was amazing I hope apan kabhi vacation me jaaye issbar ğŸ˜‚ , hum mile hall 2 me the most probably deepak ke room pe but apni dosti Hall 9 me bani, bc pata nahi kaise roz wall taapkar hall 9 aata tha dosto se milne ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜, bhai apni dank baate yaar next level hoti thi aur bc tune dhruv ne ek baar sutta chupaya tha uske liye kabi maaf nahi karunga ğŸ˜‚. Ab bc jaldi banglore aaja fir thodi ameeri se maze karenge, hall 9 park me tuti hui chair me sutte gin gin kar humne kafi economy aur nature sikha, lets meet whenever possible and will let the drinks bring back the memoriesğŸ¥°.
